value.0: Greetings, surfacer. You must be the <man/woman> that the mistress foresaw in her visions. You may enter our city and speak with her. Worry not, we will not harm you.
Charting the Underdark is a nigh-impossible task. If you head East, and only East, then you should arrive at our stronghold.
Head to the temple in the center of Lith My'athar, where she is waiting for you.
Charting the Underdark is a nigh-impossible task. If you head North and then East, you should arrive at our stronghold.
Charting the Underdark is a nigh-impossible task. If you head Northeast, you should arrive at our stronghold.
Charting the Underdark is a nigh-impossible task. If you head East and a little North, then you should arrive at our stronghold.
Charting the Underdark is a nigh-impossible task. Our stronghold is due South of here, but there is no way through: you'll have to head West first, then go South, and finally East.
Charting the Underdark is a nigh-impossible task. If you head South and then East, you should arrive at our stronghold.
Charting the Underdark is a nigh-impossible task. You'll need to head mostly East, and a little South in the middle of your journey to reach our stronghold.
I am glad you are on our side, friend. If the Seer places her trust in you, so will I.
Farewell, surfacer. I wish you luck in your battles.
You already have someone with you. I doubt you have need of my help.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I apologize, but I must remain with my brethren. The Underdark is treacherous and dangerous place and we must always be vigilant.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> I suppose an extra bow or blade wouldn't hurt. Lead the way, then.
Lead the way.
We've stopped. What is it?
Then let us continue.
I will return to the Seer, then.
I will attack from far away.
Then I will only attack up close.
Goodbye.
Where can I find her?
Farewell.
Follow me. I need your help.
You're probably right. Forget I asked.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Believe me, I need all the help I can get.
Not at the moment, no.
I no longer need your help. You're dismissed.
Thanks.
Thanks.
